abstract: Stocks are flat in light trading.
lead_paragraph: The price of oil slid, and shares of energy companies followed. Disney weighed on the Dow Jones industrial average after it reported a loss in ESPN subscribers.

headline.main: Wall St. Ends Mostly Higher, but Energy Shares Fall
headline.print_headline: Shares Flat in Light Post-Holiday Trading

snippet: The price of oil slid, and shares of energy companies followed. Disney weighed on the Dow Jones industrial average after it reported a loss in ESPN subscribers.
